## Installing R<br>

1. **Download R:** Go to the R Project website (<https://www.r-project.org/>) and select a CRAN mirror.<br>
2. **Choose Your Operating System:** Select the appropriate version of R for your operating system.<br>
3. **Install R:** Follow the installation instructions provided for your operating system.<br>

## Installing RStudio<br>

1. **Download RStudio:** Visit the RStudio download page: <https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/>.<br>
2. **Select Your Version:** Choose the appropriate version of RStudio for your operating system.<br>
3. **Install RStudio:** Follow the installation instructions provided for your operating system.<br><br>

Once both R and RStudio are installed, launch RStudio and you're ready to start using R for your data analysis and programming tasks!
